enhanced_by.reason: Both methods validate input strings, making isBlankOrNull a good candidate to ensure the input to matchRegexp is not null or blank.
Both methods involve pattern matching, making isEmail a good candidate to set up test cases for matchRegexp.
The UrlValidator's isValid method can be used to validate URLs before using them in matchRegexp tests, ensuring the input is valid.
The EmailValidator's isValid method can be used to validate emails before using them in matchRegexp tests, ensuring the input is valid.
